cards.name: Starting Fort
cards.description: Add [B,W] to your supply. Draw three cards then give one to your opponent.

cards.name: Barricaded Fortress
cards.description: Whenever an opponent attacks this fort and is done rolling, you may reroll 1 of the dice.

cards.name: Braced Stronghold
cards.description: Whenever an opponent attacks this fort, he cannot reroll [L] results.

cards.name: Cove Outpost
cards.description: Whenever an opponent attacks this fort, return 1 colonist from 1 of his ships.

cards.name: Flotilla Outpost
cards.description: Whenever an opponent attacks another 1 of your forts, he rolls 1 fewer die.

cards.name: Formidable Fortress
cards.description: Whenever an opponent attacks this fort, he rolls 1 fewer die.

cards.name: Fortified Stronghold
cards.description: Whenever an opponent attacks this fort, he cannot reroll [B] results.

cards.name: Guarded Fortress
cards.description: During a Second Wave attack on this fort, you choose which cubes are destroyed.

cards.name: Lighthouse Outpost
cards.description: Whenever 1 of your ships is destroyed, return it to your hand.

cards.name: Reefside Fortress
cards.description: Whenever an opponent attacks this fort, he cannot use his ships' abilities.

cards.name: Reinforced Stronghold
cards.description: Whenever an opponent attacks this fort, he cannot reroll [S] results.

cards.name: Robust Stronghold
cards.description: Whenever you build a building here, gain 1 gold.

cards.name: Saboteur Outpost
cards.description: Whenever an opponent attacks this fort, destroy 1 cube from his supply.

cards.name: Scout Outpost
cards.description: Whenever an opponent builds a ship, building, or fort, he scores 1 fewer coin.

cards.name: Secluded Fortress
cards.description: Whenever an opponent attacks this fort, he cannot use his building' abilities.

cards.name: Secret Fortress
cards.description: Whenever an opponent attacks this fort, he skips the Reinforce Step.

cards.name: Steep-Walled Stronghold
cards.description: Whenever an opponent attacks this fort and re-rolls, he must re-roll all the dice.

cards.name: Spy Outpost
cards.description: When you attack any fort, you may look at the defender's hand.

cards.name: Supported Stronghold
cards.description: Whenever an opponent attacks this fort, he re-rolls 1 fewer time.

cards.name: Academy
cards.description: Whenever you attack, you may remove one colonist from this building to re-roll 1 additional time.

cards.name: Armory
cards.description: Whenever you attack, add 1 [G] to your result.

cards.name: Cannon Smith
cards.description: Whenever you attack, add 1 [B] to your result.

cards.name: Cannonball Forge
cards.description: Whenever you attack, add 1 [W] to your result.

cards.name: Governor's Mansion
cards.description: When built, discard 1 random card from an opponent's hand. Your opponents cannot take Draw actions.

cards.name: Gunpowder House
cards.description: Whenever you attack, add 1 [S] to your result.

cards.name: Infirmary
cards.description: Whenever 1 of your forts, buildings, or ships is destroyed, you may move its colonists to this building. (Limit 2 per turn)

cards.name: Observatory
cards.description: Whenever you take a Draw action, discard the card you would have given an opponent.

cards.name: Prison
cards.description: When built, return 1 colonist from each of your opponents' forts. Your opponents' forts cannot gain colonists.

cards.name: Silver Smelter
cards.description: When built, remove any number of colonists from your other forts to score that many coins.

cards.name: Trade Company
cards.description: When built, destroy an opponent's building. Your opponents cannot build any buildings.

cards.name: Watchtower
cards.description: When built, destroy an opponent's ship. Your opponents cannot build any ships.

cards.name: Dominica
cards.description: [L]: Return 1 colonist off the defending fort.

cards.name: Magnifique
cards.description: [L]: Gain 1 gold.

cards.name: Raven
cards.description: [L]: Add 1 [B] to your result.

cards.name: Sister Catarina
cards.description: [L]: Add 1 [G] to your result.

cards.name: St. Daniel
cards.description: [L]: Add 1 [W] to your result.

cards.name: Victory
cards.description: [L]: Add 1 [S] to your result.
